column2: an A.M. Eatery////The menu is hardly remarkable
column3: but we were hoping the basic food listed on the menu might be incredible (according to reviews). We ordered IMMEDIATELY
column4: as soon as the waitress took our drink orders - and we waited - and waited - and waited - and after another 45 minute wait
column5: we had to go. We asked our flighty waitress about our food several times and were told each time that it was "coming".
